metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4338 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The mysql user parameter configuration script (userparameter_mysql.conf) inthe agent in Zabbix before 2.0.18, 2.2.x before 2.2.13, and 3.0.x before3.0.3, when used with a shell other than bash, allows context-dependentattackers to execute arbitrary code or SQL commands via the mysql.sizeparameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4338` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zabbix-agent - 1:2.4.7+dfsg-2ubuntu2.1
zabbix-frontend-php - 1:2.4.7+dfsg-2ubuntu2.1
zabbix-java-gateway - 1:2.4.7+dfsg-2ubuntu2.1
zabbix-proxy-mysql - 1:2.4.7+dfsg-2ubuntu2.1
zabbix-proxy-pgsql - 1:2.4.7+dfsg-2ubuntu2.1
zabbix-proxy-sqlite3 - 1:2.4.7+dfsg-2ubuntu2.1
zabbix-server-mysql - 1:2.4.7+dfsg-2ubuntu2.1
zabbix-server-pgsql - 1:2.4.7+dfsg-2ubuntu2.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: zabbix package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.4.7+dfsg-2ubuntu2.1').
